roleset.name: replace

example.name: all args
example.text: Edward M. Esber attributed the decline to reduced domestic revenue because of $4.9 million spent *trace* to downgrade existing software inventories to the new database IV Version 1.1.
example.arg: to the new database IV Version 1.1.

roleset.note: DOWNGRADE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'downgrade' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Reversal of 'upgrade'. (from downgrade.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: worsen

example.name: transitive
example.text: Recently it downgraded its plants so that it could make stain-resistant products with higher quality dyes.
example.arg: so that it could make stain-resistant products with higher quality dyes.

roleset.note: DOWNGRADE-V NOTES: The 'improve' sense is really the same as the 'replace' sense with thetwo objective arguments merged. (from downgrade.02-v)
